name: (archive m.a+) Maurizio Amadei 3-Button Fitted Jacket/Blazer
description: This archive piece from MA+ by Maurizio Amadei is over a decade old and still retains its timeless appeal. It‚Äôs a classic three-button notched lapel blazer, reflecting Amadei‚Äôs signature avant-garde silhouettes that blend sophistication with modern edge. Made from high-quality tricot-blended cotton, the blazer is constructed from two layers of fabric, giving it a dense, substantial feel. It offers an anatomical fit that moves comfortably with the wearer, thanks to its stretchable fabric. The raw taglio-vivo edges add a deconstructed, contemporary touch, and it features the signature silver cross on the sleeve. Each sleeve is finished with three horn buttons, adding an extra layer of detail and refinement. Sized to fit 48-50, it offers versatility and comfort for both sizes. In perfect condition and originally retailed for over 2000 euro, this blazer is an excellent addition for anyone seeking a refined yet unique wardrobe staple. This blazer can be beautifully complemented by the MA+ spiral pants, also listed in my profile, for a complete avant-garde ensemble. Let me know if you‚Äôd like any measurements or further details!
designer: Ma+, Maurizio Altieri, Taichimurakami Maurizio Amadei

name: MA+ MAURIZIO AMADEI AVANTGARDE HANDMADE MANDARIN JACKET
description:
Maurizio Amadei avantgarde handmade mandarin aviator gold zip jacket / M.A.+ 
The famous grail from the great master Maurizio Amadei. Strict and ascetic monumentalism, inspired by architecture and unity with nature. Each item by Maurizio has a special ‚Äúarchitecture‚Äù that distinguishes it from the rest of avant-garde art: clarity and severity of lines/use of only premium leather (in my case, horse leather)/‚Äúnarrow‚Äù silhouettes/extended sleeves with an asymmetrical zipper/only premium locks and other accessories. The distinctive features of this jacket can be listed endlessly, but the main thing is that when you put on this thing, you literally feel like you are wearing armor that does not hinder movement and has the scent of horse leather, as well as the most pleasant sound of the ‚Äústroke‚Äù of the cord.
Special attention is paid to the golden coating, unstable coloring with various coatings and reflections in silver/lead and brown. Depends on cloud cover and time of day.
Size 48/M

name: Maurizio Amadei M.A+ Cross Cashmere Ribbed Knit Sweater
description:
Maurizio Amadei (M.A+) 
And again, another former member of the legendary band Carpe Diem! 
Maurizio didn‚Äôt take long to ‚Äúaccelerate‚Äù and in the year Carpe Diem closed, he founded the brand under his own name. 
His works are distinguished by a unique cut: the collections include clothes and shoes created from a single piece. The MA+ aesthetic leans towards minimalism and clean lines. 
The designer creates handmade clothing and accessories in Rome. Amadei has developed its own style for m.a + as a way of life, and again ‚Äúinnovation, innovation and more innovation‚Äù! 
Created in almost one piece, a detailed cashmere sweater can be a staple in any wardrobe. Long silhouette / short sleeves / recognizable red ‚Äúm.a cross‚Äù on the chest / main seam in the form
Size M/48

This stunning piece is from the Italian avantgarde brand Ma+, which was founded in 2006 by Maurizio Amadei, a former member of the legendary Carpe Diem team. Characteristics of Ma+ are a long and slim silhouette, details made from real silver, and their iconic cross logo which can be found on nearly all of their pieces. Adding to that, the brand is known for its unique fabric choices and unusual construction techniques. Garments are for example often made from only one single piece of fabric. All Ma+ pieces are completely handmade in a small atelier, just outside of Rome, Italy.

This specific pair of trousers is made from an unusual type of cotton which looks and feels more like wool. They feature a subtle stripe pattern and the iconic cross logo in sterling silver. Adding to that, they are constructed with long twisting seams and unfinished hems. As usual, the quality of this piece is incredible which is also why it had a retail price of nearly 1300$. The trousers are still completely unworn and brand new with tags.

I am located in Germany and I ship worldwide.
